name: 1380WPHM
0:
”Alexa, launch thirteen eighty w. p. h. m..”
”Alexa, open thirteen eighty w. p. h. m..”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: thirteen eighty w. p. h. m.
des:
Port Huron News, Talk, and Sports.
Once enabled, just say: "Alexa, open thirteen eighty w. p. h. m." and Alexa will guide you from there!
After that, you can say things like:
 * "Listen to on demand"
 * "Resume"
 * "On demand options"
When playing audio, you can say:
 * Alexa, pause
When playing on-demand content, you can skip to an older show by saying:
 * Alexa, next
And navigate to the previous segment by saying:
 * Alexa, go back
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
